channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why good teams beat good ideas
item.description: Who discovered the lightbulb? If you answered “Thomas Edison,” you’re not alone—and you’re also not quite right. Despite conventional wisdom that asso...

item.title: Stripe and Paradigm announce new payments-focused blockchain Tempo
item.description: Led by Paradigm managing partner Matt Huang, Tempo is Big Tech’s first major move into crypto.

item.title: Trump’s Fed pick gets blasted for planning to stay at the White House
item.description: Stephen Miran, President Donald Trump’s pick to join the Federal Reserve board , said Thursday that he would remain a White House employee even if the...

item.title: After Its Sydney Sweeney Campaign Controversy, American Eagle Sales Are Up
item.description: The retailer said its customer count was up more than 700,000 since the launch of its campaigns with Sweeney and Travis Kelce.

item.title: Why your daily coffee is suddenly so expensive
item.description: Prepare to pay (even) more for your daily cup of joe: Coffee prices have spiked in recent months, primarily because of global supply issues, though U....

item.title: Trump’s dinner with tech CEOs at the White House won’t include Musk
item.description: President Donald Trump will host a high-powered list of tech CEOs for a dinner at the White House on Thursday night. The guest list is set to include ...

item.title: Tariff instability and a break with China is hitting American companies hard, and homegrown manufacturer John Deere is no exception
item.description: Trump’s tariff policies are hitting John Deere’s customers hard.

item.title: This CEO Will Not Be Joining Trump’s Tech Dinner Tonight
item.description: Trump will host top tech CEOs at a White House dinner tonight. But one notable name is absent from the guest list.

item.title: Authorities raided Streameast’s offices and shut down the largest illegal sports streaming platform that had over 1.6 billion visits in the last year
item.description: The network illegally streamed matches and games from Europe’s Premier League and Champions League, as well as those from the NFL, NBA, and MLB.

item.title: As Trump pushes Supreme Court to uphold his tariffs, he signals trade deals will be defunct if he loses the case: ‘I guess we’d have to unwind them’
item.description: “If we don't win that case, our country is going to suffer so greatly, so greatly,” the president said on Wednesday.

item.title: Women Grasp Work Networks Better, But That May Affect Their Career Paths. Here’s Why
item.description: Research shows that women have a superior understanding of professional relationships across a company. Is that a superpower or a handicap?

item.title: These Two Companies Took Different Directions With AI Adoption
item.description: Salesforce and Klarna both bet big on AI. Here’s what happened next.

item.title: If You’re Using Microsoft Teams, Beware: Hackers Could be Targeting Your Company
item.description: Zoom is affected too. It’s an ideal moment to remind your staff that good cybersecurity is an ongoing discipline, not a one-off issue.

item.title: If Trump’s tariffs are thrown out, companies could be refunded billions
item.description: President Donald Trump likes to boast about how much money the U.S. Treasury is raking in from the massive taxes—tariffs—he’s slapped this year on imp...

item.title: Lose-lose: Even if the Supreme Court strikes down Trump’s tariffs, consumers likely wouldn’t see a dime from refunds
item.description: The Trump administration might balk at paying back the tariffs it’s collected.

item.title: How the Fed could lower mortgage rates nearly overnight. (It’s not a rate cut.)
Stocks little changed as Wall Street grows more concerned about U.S. job market
It will take a doozy of a jobs report to derail investors' rate-cut expectations
